thread.title: Chicago Cubs vs. Pittsburgh Pirates wild card game: MLB live stream, TBS TV schedule, start time
thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs vs. Pittsburgh Pirates wild card game: MLB live stream, TBS TV schedule, start time

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Chicago Cubs vs. Pittsburgh Pirates wild card game: MLB live stream, TBS TV schedule, start time
text:
Comments 
The Chicago Cubs and Pittsburgh Pirates will face off in the NL Wild Card Game Wednesday night as the two NL Central teams vie to the chance to take on the St. Louis Cardinals in the Divisional Series round. 
Here's all the game info you need, along with listings for the TV broadcast and live stream services. Game info Round : NL Wild Card Game Start Time : 8 p.m. EST Location : PNC Park TV Broadcast Channel : TBS Play-by-play : Casey Stern Analysts : Pedro Martinez, Gary Sheffield, Dusty Baker. 
Bonus for Boston Red Sox fans: Pedro as a baseball analyst. Live Stream 
With the MLB postseason moving to national broadcasts, it's easier to get ahead of an online broadcast. Even the official MLB option is more reasonable. 
MLB.tv Postseason Package - A package from the league that lets you catch postseason games streaming on your computer and other devices. May not include all ALCS/NLCS games. 
TBS.com (or TBS Mobile app ) - The more reasonable options for those who don't want to pay for a seperate service. 
--- 
With the Houston Astros and New York Yankees locking up the AL side Tuesday night, the Cubs-Pirates wild card game is the last matchup before the Divisional Series games are finalized. The winner of the series will go into the next round having had to expend their top starter in this winner-take-all game, giving their next opponent the advantage. 
The Cubs will send out their suddenly dominant ace, Jake Arrieta, who has supplanted Jon Lester as the team's top arm. On the other side, the Pirates will send 25-year-old Gerrit Cole to the mound.
